item.title: By: ayah
item.dc:creator: ayah
item.description: i know! i dont know where the "span column" stuff is coming from. It's not from micropoll, or the site. But voting still works. Ill try to fix this ugliness..
item.content:encoded: i know! i dont know where the “span column” stuff is coming from. It’s not from micropoll, or the site. But voting still works. Ill try to fix this ugliness..

item.title: By: Ed Marshall
item.dc:creator: Ed Marshall
item.description:
Just FYI: the voting page is pretty badly rendered in most of the browsers I tested (IE/Chrome/FF on Win7, Chrome on Linux); the background doesn't appear to surround the voting choices, and there's little visible boxes around every section of the screen.
But, voting still works. :) Great job on narrowing down the selection; that was a ton of logos to go through!
item.content:encoded:
Just FYI: the voting page is pretty badly rendered in most of the browsers I tested (IE/Chrome/FF on Win7, Chrome on Linux); the background doesn’t appear to surround the voting choices, and there’s little visible boxes around every section of the screen.

But, voting still works. ðŸ™‚ Great job on narrowing down the selection; that was a ton of logos to go through!
